channel.title: Kubernetes on Niuhe's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Niuhe's Blog

item.title: Manjaro 搭建 minikube 环境
item.description: 安装 minikube 安装依赖 1 sudo pacman -Sy libvirt qemu ebtables dnsmasq 1 2 sudo usermod -a -G libvirt $(whoami) newgrp libvirt 1 2 3 4 5 sudo systemctl start libvirtd.service sudo systemctl enable libvirtd.service sudo systemctl start virtlogd.service sudo systemctl enable virtlogd.service 装docker和kvm2 驱动 1 sudo pacman -Sy docker-machine 1 yaourt -Sy docker-machine-driver-kvm2 装
